chapter.keywords: online king james holy bible, king james bible, bible todo list, words of Jesus, bible index, the authorised version, KJV, KJB, KJAV, AV

items.text: O give thanks unto the LORD; call upon his name: make known his deeds among the people.
items.plainText: O give thanks unto the LORD; call upon his name: make known his deeds among the people.

items.text: Sing unto him, sing psalms unto him: talk ye of all his wondrous works.
items.plainText: Sing unto him, sing psalms unto him: talk ye of all his wondrous works.

items.text: Glory ye in his holy name: let the heart of them rejoice that seek the LORD.
items.plainText: Glory ye in his holy name: let the heart of them rejoice that seek the LORD.

items.text: Seek the LORD, and his strength: seek his face evermore.
items.plainText: Seek the LORD, and his strength: seek his face evermore.

items.text: Remember his marvellous works that he hath done; his wonders, and the judgments of his mouth;
items.plainText: Remember his marvellous works that he hath done; his wonders, and the judgments of his mouth;

items.text: O ye seed of Abraham his servant, ye children of Jacob his chosen.
items.plainText: O ye seed of Abraham his servant, ye children of Jacob his chosen.

items.text: He is the LORD our God: his judgments are in all the earth.
items.plainText: He is the LORD our God: his judgments are in all the earth.

items.text: He hath remembered his covenant for ever, the word which he commanded to a thousand generations.
items.plainText: He hath remembered his covenant for ever, the word which he commanded to a thousand generations.

items.text: Which covenant he made with Abraham, and his oath unto Isaac;
items.plainText: Which covenant he made with Abraham, and his oath unto Isaac;

items.text: And confirmed the same unto Jacob for a law, and to Israel for an everlasting covenant:
items.plainText: And confirmed the same unto Jacob for a law, and to Israel for an everlasting covenant:

items.text: Saying, Unto thee will I give the land of Canaan, the lot of your inheritance:
items.plainText: Saying, Unto thee will I give the land of Canaan, the lot of your inheritance:

items.text: When they were but a few men in number; yea, very few, and strangers in it.
items.plainText: When they were but a few men in number; yea, very few, and strangers in it.

items.text: When they went from one nation to another, from one kingdom to another people;
items.plainText: When they went from one nation to another, from one kingdom to another people;

items.text: He suffered no man to do them wrong: yea, he reproved kings for their sakes;
items.plainText: He suffered no man to do them wrong: yea, he reproved kings for their sakes;

items.text: Saying, Touch not mine anointed, and do my prophets no harm.
items.plainText: Saying, Touch not mine anointed, and do my prophets no harm.

items.text: Moreover he called for a famine upon the land: he brake the whole staff of bread.
items.plainText: Moreover he called for a famine upon the land: he brake the whole staff of bread.

items.text: He sent a man before them, even Joseph, who was sold for a servant:
items.plainText: He sent a man before them, even Joseph, who was sold for a servant:

items.text: Whose feet they hurt with fetters: he was laid in iron:
items.plainText: Whose feet they hurt with fetters: he was laid in iron:

items.text: Until the time that his word came: the word of the LORD tried him.
items.plainText: Until the time that his word came: the word of the LORD tried him.

items.text: The king sent and loosed him; even the ruler of the people, and let him go free.
items.plainText: The king sent and loosed him; even the ruler of the people, and let him go free.

items.text: He made him lord of his house, and ruler of all his substance:
items.plainText: He made him lord of his house, and ruler of all his substance:

items.text: To bind his princes at his pleasure; and teach his senators wisdom.
items.plainText: To bind his princes at his pleasure; and teach his senators wisdom.

items.text: Israel also came into Egypt; and Jacob sojourned in the land of Ham.
items.plainText: Israel also came into Egypt; and Jacob sojourned in the land of Ham.

items.text: And he increased his people greatly; and made them stronger than their enemies.
items.plainText: And he increased his people greatly; and made them stronger than their enemies.

items.text: He turned their heart to hate his people, to deal subtilly with his servants.
items.plainText: He turned their heart to hate his people, to deal subtilly with his servants.

items.text: He sent Moses his servant; and Aaron whom he had chosen.
items.plainText: He sent Moses his servant; and Aaron whom he had chosen.

items.text: They shewed his signs among them, and wonders in the land of Ham.
items.plainText: They shewed his signs among them, and wonders in the land of Ham.

items.text: He sent darkness, and made it dark; and they rebelled not against his word.
items.plainText: He sent darkness, and made it dark; and they rebelled not against his word.

items.text: He turned their waters into blood, and slew their fish.
items.plainText: He turned their waters into blood, and slew their fish.

items.text: Their land brought forth frogs in abundance, in the chambers of their kings.
items.plainText: Their land brought forth frogs in abundance, in the chambers of their kings.

items.text: He spake, and there came divers sorts of flies, and lice in all their coasts.
items.plainText: He spake, and there came divers sorts of flies, and lice in all their coasts.

items.text: He gave them hail for rain, and flaming fire in their land.
items.plainText: He gave them hail for rain, and flaming fire in their land.

items.text: He smote their vines also and their fig trees; and brake the trees of their coasts.
items.plainText: He smote their vines also and their fig trees; and brake the trees of their coasts.

items.text: He spake, and the locusts came, and caterpillers, and that without number,
items.plainText: He spake, and the locusts came, and caterpillers, and that without number,

items.text: And did eat up all the herbs in their land, and devoured the fruit of their ground.
items.plainText: And did eat up all the herbs in their land, and devoured the fruit of their ground.

items.text: He smote also all the firstborn in their land, the chief of all their strength.
items.plainText: He smote also all the firstborn in their land, the chief of all their strength.

items.text: He brought them forth also with silver and gold: and there was not one feeble person among their tribes.
items.plainText: He brought them forth also with silver and gold: and there was not one feeble person among their tribes.

items.text: Egypt was glad when they departed: for the fear of them fell upon them.
items.plainText: Egypt was glad when they departed: for the fear of them fell upon them.

items.text: He spread a cloud for a covering; and fire to give light in the night.
items.plainText: He spread a cloud for a covering; and fire to give light in the night.

items.text: The people asked, and he brought quails, and satisfied them with the bread of heaven.
items.plainText: The people asked, and he brought quails, and satisfied them with the bread of heaven.

items.text: He opened the rock, and the waters gushed out; they ran in the dry places like a river.
items.plainText: He opened the rock, and the waters gushed out; they ran in the dry places like a river.

items.text: For he remembered his holy promise, and Abraham his servant.
items.plainText: For he remembered his holy promise, and Abraham his servant.

items.text: And he brought forth his people with joy, and his chosen with gladness:
items.plainText: And he brought forth his people with joy, and his chosen with gladness:

items.text: And gave them the lands of the heathen: and they inherited the labour of the people;
items.plainText: And gave them the lands of the heathen: and they inherited the labour of the people;

items.text: That they might observe his statutes, and keep his laws. Praise ye the LORD.
items.plainText: That they might observe his statutes, and keep his laws. Praise ye the LORD.
